snippet: Judges of the International Criminal Court told the court’s chief prosecutor to review her decision not to investigate the deadly 2010 encounter.
abstract: International Criminal Court judges request that chief prosecutor Fatou Bensouda review her decision not to investigate deadly Israeli commando raid on Gaza-bound flotilla of aid ships in 2010.

byline.original: By MARLISE SIMONS and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Marlise Simons reported from Paris, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Judges of the International Criminal Court told the court’s chief prosecutor to review her decision not to investigate the deadly 2010 encounter.

headline.main: New Review Ordered Into Israel’s Gaza Flotilla Raid
headline.print_headline: New Review Urged in Israeli Flotilla Raid
